author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Open source is moving fast, and this week’s updates hit AI, edge computing, cloud-native security, and open network standards.

🧠 What does it really take to scale AI across cloud-native platforms?
📡 How are new open APIs reshaping industries?
🔐 Why is security top-of-mind for major open-source projects?
⚡ And where is open-source innovation quietly changing the game?

📺 Catch all the biggest moves in just 60 seconds — watch this week’s LF Quick Hits! 

#LFQuickHits #OpenSource #CloudNative #EdgeComputing #AI #Cybersecurity
title: This Week in Open Source: AI, Security, Cloud Updates
